name: Bots Rush
description: Bots Rush is a unique mix of Tower Defense and logistic puzzle. You will find a set of interesting and complicated game levels, original enemies. Your task is simply to build a network of roads to deliver resources to factories and ammo to towers. Sounds easy, right? Lets check this out.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: i3 Memory: 1024 MB RAM Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Memory: 2048 MB RAM Storage: 100 MB available space
